text: Charles P. "Charlie" Beasley (September 23, 1945 - April 11, 2015) was an American basketball player. He played for the Dallas Chaparrals (1967–70), Texas Chaparrals and The Floridians (1970–71) in the ABA for 281 games. Beasley was born in Shawnee, Oklahoma. He was married and had a son. Beasley died on April 11, 2015 in McKinney, Texas, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:People from Shawnee, Oklahoma Category:Shooting guards Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma
